SELECT p.id, p.identification_type AS identificationType, p.identification_no AS identificationNo, p.`name`, p.sex, p.cellphone, p.nation, p.join_party_time AS joinPartyTime, a.`name` AS agencyName, p.political_affiliation AS politicalAffiliation, p.birthday FROM org_personnel AS p LEFT JOIN org_agency AS a ON p.agency_id = a.id WHERE p.is_delete = 0
AND p.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{query.name} ,'%')
ORDER BY p.create_time DESC
